Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Antibacterial protein FALL-39 (FALL-39 peptide antibiotic; primates, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Expressed in epithelia of various organs. Most abundant peptide levels are found in organs lining outer or inner body surfaces, such as organs of the respiratory or gastrointestinal tract.

Literature.Title: Rhesus monkey (Macaca mulatta) mucosal antimicrobial peptides are close homologues of human molecules.
Literature.Author: Bals R, Lang C, Weiner DJ, Vogelmeier C, Welsch U, Wilson JM.
